name: Absolute 0
description: A very strong menthol.  This is pure USP menthol in your choice of nicotine strength and ratio.  Great for mixing with other juices.

name: Apple Bourbon Tobacco
description: Apple, bourbon and aged tobacco.  This is a sweet and rich vape, light on the tobacco with hints of toffee and brown sugar.  I actually made this flavor because I wanted a vape that tasted good while drinking whiskey and not destroy the taste of the libation.  I made this, and it is a great pairing for the whiskey drinkers out there.  This is a recommended steep.

name: Black Pompom
description: Black currant, pomegranate, a slight hint of lemon.  Pure deliciousness.

name: Bloody Mango
description: Fresh, ripe mango and blood orange.  This is a very refreshing vape.  No steeping necessary.

name: Blue Jazzberry
description: Think blue raspberry ice, or a blue raspberry candy.

name: Butter Beer
description:
Creamy butterscotch, vanilla, and a few other things.  This is a great vape with coffee in the morning.  This does not taste like beer.  
 
You're a wizard 'Arry!

name: Caramel Apple
description: Smooth Caramel, and ripe red apples.  Delicious.

name: Chamberry
description: Champagne and strawberries!  The label actually say's "Will You Be My Valentine?" on it.  I will add any name on special request!  Give it AS a valentine!

name: Coolcumber Melon
description: Honeydew, cucumber and mint.  A light refreshing vape.

name: Cranapple
description: Cranberry and apple, simple, clean.  A great all day vape.

name: Fluffy Cake
description: It tastes like red velvet cake with cream cheese icing, the juice isn't red though.

name: Frosty Apple
description: Red apple with a cool sensation like menthol, but, without the menthol taste.

name: Frosty Blue Jazzberry
description: Think blue raspberry ice.  This has a cool, but not menthol thing going.  AKA - Shmeisenberg special

name: Frosty Cranberry
description: Cranberry with a cool sensation like menthol, but, without the menthol taste.

name: Frosty Peach
description: A ripe peach flavor with a cool feeling like menthol, but, without the menthol taste.

name: Frosty Strawberry
description: Strawberry with a cool sensation like menthol, but, without the menthol taste.

name: Funky Monkey
description: Banana, chocolate, vanilla and nuts.  Delicious.

name: Hobbes' Blood
description: Watermelon, strawberry and a very light hint of coconut.  Think of the "Tigers Blood" snow cone or shave ice flavor.  Just like that!

name: Honey Nut Tobacco
description: A light tobacco flavor with honey, toasted almonds and hazelnut.  This flavor is slightly sweet but not overpowering.

name: Honey Pearry
description: Honeydew with hints of strawberry and pear.

name: Nephalim
description:
This is a mod that has no batteries.  It is a straight 5v DC current (nominally) with nearly zero voltage drop that is plugged into a standard wall outlet.  Great to have at your desk or in the shop at your work bench.
Owners manual
 
FREE PRIORITY, INSURED SHIPPING!

name: Nutty Caramel Apple
description: Smooth Caramel, and ripe red apples rolled in peanuts.  Just like the county fair!  Delicious.

name: PB Nomnoms
description: Think warm peanut butter cookies, brown sugar and vanilla.

name: Peach Tea
description: Peach iced tea!

name: Pear Brandy
description: Strong on the pear with a sweet hint of brandy.

name: Peppermint Pattie
description: Rich chocolate and cool, creamy peppermint.  Get the sensation!

name: Shmecto Shmooler
description: Like the old HI-C drink from the 90's.

name: Shmuffer Shmutter
description: Peanut butter, bananas and toasted marshmallows.  Enough said.

name: Some 'Mores
description: Toasted marshmallow, chocolate and Graham crackers.  Hot damn!

name: Southern Hospitality
description: A sweet tobacco flavor, with hints of peaches and brown sugar.

name: Unicorn Poop
description: Well...  everyone knows Unicorns poop cupcakes and rainbows!  This tastes like blueberry cupcakes with white chocolate frosting and a raspberry on top!

name: VC Menthol Tobacco #13
description: Smokey, dry and simple.

name: VC Menthol Tobacco #42
description: A warm and clean tobacco flavor.

name: VC Tobacco # 42
description: A warm, clean and sweet tobacco flavor.  Hints of toffee and caramel.

name: VC Tobacco #13
description: Smokey, dry and simple.

name: Zero Centigrade
description: A standard strength menthol.  This is pure USP menthol in your choice of nic strength and ratio.  Great for mixing with other juices.
